page.title: 16A Survey of Scartho. Part 2.
page.content: especially in the parts not deliberately developed as{estates. The impression is of a nice place to live. {Shopping. There are a small number of shops dotted around in the nearby village of{Scartho,}which sell a wide variety of goods. This makes in unnecessary to go to town for regular provisions, but there is a good regular bus service to central {Grimsby,}serving most of the estate. Many of the other small shops around the estate seem to survive competition with the village and{Grimsby,}if they provide the necessary{local services like,{fish and chips}and{newspapers.
